channel.title: How can I make NPCs talk?
channel.description: In the old (much better) Czar Era. It was very easy to edit what people said.. but I am curious how to do it in a delta source.

item.title: How can I make NPCs talk?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

public void UpdateNPCChat() {

Simply create unused case numbers and the talk line.

talk("NPC Words", NPCID);

If you meant talk like above their heads.

NPCHandler.npcs[NPCID].updateRequired = true; NPCHandler.npcs[NPCID].textUpdateRequired = true; NPCHandler.npcs[NPCID].textUpdate = "TextHere";

Put that into a method and call that method when you want them to talk.
